vmtranslationupdate.message.update: [VM Chinese Group]: Hello %s, your Chinese localization patch is outdated! Current version is %s, latest version is %s.
vmtranslationupdate.message.error: [VM Chinese Group]: Error! There is an issue with the Chinese localization update detection.
vmtranslationupdate.message.hover: Click me to download the new version on the official website!
vmtranslationupdate.message.pack: VM Chinese update auto reprint failed! Please enable "%s" packages manually in "Options -> Resource Packs".
text.autoconfig.vmtranslationupdate.opti: File name of the resource pack
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.vmtransla: A mod for checking for updates to VMChineseTranslationGroup's localization patches and automatically downloading resource packs.
